title: Hulk: World War Hulks - Hulked-Out Heroes (Trade Paperback)
description:
The most incredible new character from the House of Ideas: HULKPOOL! What sacrifices will he make for the greater good? What horrible decisions will change the world as we know it? And what do Devil Dinosaur, Rawhide Kid, Rama Tut, and Bluebeard the Pirate have to do with this? Then see what the other hulked-out heroes have been up to as the gamma-god of Thunder and a not-so-friendly Spider-Man tear up D.C. in a brawl of titanic proportions! Plus, Wolverine and Bucky Barnes square-off in a battle destined to prove which of these two WW2 vets is REALLY the best there is at what they do!Collecting WORLD WAR HULKS: HULKED-OUT HEROES #1-2, WORLD WAR HULKS: SPIDER-MAN VS. THOR #1-2 and WORLD WAR HULKS: WOLVERINE VS.
CAPTAIN AMERICA #1-2.
Rated T  …$19.99
